title: [bug] : async entrypoint not working for mobile

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

```
Panic in mod.rs:86: Cannot start a runtime from within a runtime. This happens because a function (like `block_on`) attempted to block the current thread while the thread is being used to drive asynchronous tasks.

```

### Reproduction

Make `run` async in lib.rs
